p: The addition of AC to soil significantly reduced the shoot biomass of S. canadensis ( F 1,8 = 58.169, P = 0.007) but increased the shoot biomass of K. striata ( F 1,7 = 9.561, P = 0.018) ( Fig. 1A). AC reduced AMF colonization of S. canadensis ( F 1,8 = 47.287, P<0.001) but did not affect AMF colonization of K. striata ( F 1,7 = 2.523, P = 0.131) ( Fig. 1B).
